page.title: 10Scouting ands Guiding.
page.content: {Scouts}is one of my hobbies, it is one way of testing a boys mind. We meet every Friday night at 7:30 at the Scout hut up Irton Lane. We have all sorts of different nights, there should be six in a patrol, Patrol Leader, assistant patrol leader and four other boys. {Badges.}There are four main badges and about forty to fifty interest or pursuit badges. The four main badges are, the link badge, the scout standard, the advanced scout standard and the chief scouts award. These are some of the things we do at scouts,{Absailing, Rock Climbing, {Orienteering, A Hike and a Reference {Hike. {Guides,}our uniform is a navy skirt, blue blouse, yellow necker, brown belt and a blue hat. We are each put into { {patrols}which are like groups.
